name: Taylor Tomlinson
monologue: Our big story tonight, unfortunately: Elon Musk has done it again. [Picture of Musk doing a Hitler salute at Trump’s inauguration] No, not that. I mean, he probably has, in private.

name: Taylor Tomlinson
